mapper.select: select tpj.name from t_dependence td left join t_project tpj on td.pid = tpj.id where td.pid != #{pid} and EXISTS(select tm.id from t_project tp left join t_module tm on tp.id = tm.pid where tp.id = #{pid} and td.depend_mid = tm.id) group by tpj.name
